languages.text: "Я тоже рада биться плечом к плечу с достойной служительницей Его. Хоть обычно я и охочусь в одиночестве".
"I too am glad to fight side by side with His worthy servant, even though I usually hunt alone."
languages.original_text: "Я тоже рада биться плечом к плечу с достойной служительницей Его. Хоть обычно я и охочусь в одиночестве".

traits.locale_text: "I too am glad to fight side by side with His worthy servant, even though I usually hunt alone."
"I too am glad to fight side by side with His worthy servant, even though I usually hunt alone."

languages.text: "Auch ich bin froh, Seite an Seite mit seinem treuen Dienern zu kämpfen, auch wenn ich üblicherweise allein kämpfe."
languages.original_text: "I too am glad to fight side by side with His worthy servant, even though I usually hunt alone."

traits.locale_text: "Auch ich bin froh, Seite an Seite mit seinem treuen Dienern zu kämpfen, auch wenn ich üblicherweise allein kämpfe."

languages.text: « Moi aussi, je me réjouis de combattre au côté de Son fidèle bras droit, même si j'ai l'habitude de chasser seule. »
languages.original_text: "I too am glad to fight side by side with His worthy servant, even though I usually hunt alone."

traits.locale_text: « Moi aussi, je me réjouis de combattre au côté de Son fidèle bras droit, même si j'ai l'habitude de chasser seule. »

languages.text: «Yo también me alegro de luchar con Su sierva, aunque normalmente cace en solitario».
languages.original_text: "I too am glad to fight side by side with His worthy servant, even though I usually hunt alone."

traits.locale_text: «Yo también me alegro de luchar con Su sierva, aunque normalmente cace en solitario».

languages.text: 「私もいつもは一人で狩りをするけれど、主の立派なしもべと肩を並べて戦えることをうれしく思うわ」
languages.original_text: "I too am glad to fight side by side with His worthy servant, even though I usually hunt alone."

traits.locale_text: 「私もいつもは一人で狩りをするけれど、主の立派なしもべと肩を並べて戦えることをうれしく思うわ」

languages.text: “我也很高兴能与祂可敬的仆人并肩作战，尽管我通常都是独自狩猎。”
languages.original_text: "I too am glad to fight side by side with His worthy servant, even though I usually hunt alone."

traits.locale_text: “我也很高兴能与祂可敬的仆人并肩作战，尽管我通常都是独自狩猎。”

languages.original_text: "I too am glad to fight side by side with His worthy servant, even though I usually hunt alone."

languages.text: "Her ne kadar yalnız avlanmayı tercih etsem de O'nun saygın hizmetkârlarıyla omuz omuza savaşmaktan ben de memnunum."
languages.original_text: "I too am glad to fight side by side with His worthy servant, even though I usually hunt alone."
